attributes.title: Costa Del Mar tradeshow exhibit by Czarnowski Display Service
attributes.description:
Created on August 31, 2010 by znzn on Sourcemap.org:

to determine the impact of using reclaimed pine wood to build an exhibit for our client.  The pine was originally harvested in West Virginia, where the barn was built.  The dismantled barn was transported to Orlando for assembly.  The exhibit was then shipped to Salt Lake City for the Outdoor Retailers trade show.
